data.name: Microsoft, Surface Pro 10, 13", 512GB, Platinum, Tablets
data.short_description: Microsoft, Tablets, 13", 512GB Storage, Available in: JP
data.description:
General Information

  • Brand: Microsoft
  • Model: Microsoft Surface Pro 10 ZDW-00011
  • Color: Platinum
  • Operating System: Windows 11 Pro 23H2
  • Series: Surface Pro
  • Warranty: 1 year limited

Display

  • Screen Size: 13 inches
  • Resolution: 2880 x 1920
  • Touchscreen: Yes

Processor

  • CPU: 14th Generation Intel Core Ultra 7 Processor 165U (up to 4.9 GHz)
  • Number of Cores: 12

Memory

  • RAM: 16GB

Storage

  • Storage Type: SSD
  • Storage Capacity: 512GB

Connection and Ports

  • Other Connections: USB 4.0/Thunderbolt 4, USB-C x 2, SurfaceConnect, Surface keyboard port
  • Wireless Connectivity: IEEE802.11a/b/g/n/ac/ax, Bluetooth 5.3

Battery and Power

  • Battery Life: Up to approx. 19 hours (assuming general use)
  • Power Consumption: Sleep: 0.4W, Idle: 4.2W
  • Power Adapter: Included

Other Features

  • Webcam: Front: Surface Studio Camera Ultra Wide Angle 114 Degree 1440p Quad HD, Rear: 10.5 MP Ultra HD Camera
  • Speakers: 2W stereo speakers with Dolby Atmos
  • Accessories: Power adapter, Quick start guide, Safety and warranty documents
  • Office: Microsoft 365 Apps (unapproved, 1 month trial version) pre-installed
  • Dimensions (L x W x H): approx. 287mm x 208.6mm x 9.3mm
  • Weight: 879g (main body)

data.description:
General Information​

  • Brand: Apple
  • Model: Apple MacBook Pro 16" M4 Pro 14-Core CPU, 20-Core GPU, 48GB RAM, 1TB SSD, QWERTY, Silver

  • Touchbar: No

Display

  • Screen Size: 16.2 inches
  • Resolution: 3456x2234
  • Pixel Density: 254ppi
  • Backlight: LED
  • Screen Coating: Glossy
  • Touchscreen: No
  • Refresh Rate: 120Hz
  • Brightness: 1,600cd/m² peak (HDR), 1,000cd/m² max full-screen
  • Aspect Ratio: 1.55:1

  • CPU/SOC: Apple M4 Pro 14-core
  • Number of Cores: 14
  • Motherboard Chipset: In SoC

Memory

  • RAM: 48GB
  • Memory Type: Unified Memory
  • Maximum RAM Capacity: 48GB
  • Memory Form Factor: Soldered

Storage

  • Storage Type: Solid State Disk (SSD)
  • Storage Capacity: 1TB

Graphics

  • Integrated GPU: Apple M4 Pro 20-core
  • Video Memory: Shared Unified Memory

Connection and Ports

  • Video Output: HDMI, 3x Thunderbolt 5
  • Video Output (via Thunderbolt): USB Type-C to DP 1.4/HDMI 2.1
  • Highest HDMI Version: HDMI 2.1
  • Other Connections: 3x Thunderbolt 5, Headphone output
  • Wireless Connectivity: 802.11a/b/g/n/ac/ax (Wi-Fi 6E), Bluetooth 5.3

Battery and Power

  • Power Adapter: 140W
  • AC Adapter Connection: USB-C to MagSafe 3

Other Features

  • Extra Laptop Features: Dolby Atmos, FaceTime HD Camera, Force Touch Trackpad

data.name: Apple, MacBook Air, M4, 2025, 13", 24GB, 512GB, QWERTY - United States, Silver, Laptops
data.short_description: Apple, Laptops, 13", 24GB, 512GB, Available in: US, PR
data.description:
General Information

  • Product: Apple MacBook Air - 13" - M4
  • Category: Notebooks
  • Brand: Apple
  • Series: MacBook Air
  • Color: Silver

Display Specifications

  • Screen Size: 13 inches
  • Resolution: 2560 x 1664 (WQXGA)
  • Panel Type: IPS
  • Brightness: 500 cd/m²
  • Color Depth: 1 billion colors
  • Display Features: True Tone, HDR10+, Dolby Vision, P3 Wide Color Gamut, Liquid Retina display
  • Touchscreen: No

Performance

  • Processor: Apple M4
  • CPU Cores: 10-core
  • GPU: Apple M4 10-core GPU
  • Neural Engine: 16-core
  • Memory: 24 GB Unified RAM
  • Memory Bandwidth: 120 GB/s

Storage

  • Storage Capacity: 512 GB SSD
  • SSD Form Factor: Soldered

Camera & Audio

  • Front Camera: 1080p FaceTime HD
  • Microphone: 3 beam-forming microphones
  • Audio Output: Four speakers with Dolby Atmos

Connectivity & Ports

  • USB Type-C Ports: 2 x USB4 (Thunderbolt 4, DisplayPort 1.4 Alt Mode, Charging)
  • Audio Jack: Yes (3.5mm headphone output)
  • Wireless: Wi-Fi 6E (802.11ax), Bluetooth 5.3

Input & Security

  • Keyboard: Apple Magic Keyboard with Touch ID (QWERTY - United States)
  • Keyboard Backlight: Yes
  • Trackpad: Force Touch trackpad
  • Fingerprint Sensor: Yes (Touch ID)

Battery & Power

  • Battery Type: Lithium Polymer
  • Battery Capacity: 53.8 Wh
  • Battery Life: Up to 18 hours
  • Power Adapter: 35W USB-C Dual Port Compact Power Adapter

Dimensions & Weight

  • Height: 0.4 inches
  • Width: 12 inches
  • Depth: 8.5 inches
  • Weight: 2.73 lbs

Software & OS

  • Operating System: macOS Sequoia 15.0
  • Pre-installed Software: Safari, Messages, FaceTime, Mail, Maps, Notes, Photos, Music, Podcasts, and more

Service & Warranty

  • Warranty: 1-year limited warranty
  • Technical Support: 90 days of phone support

  • Audio Input Type: 3 beam-forming microphone array

  • Interfaces: 2 x USB4 (supports Thunderbolt 4, DisplayPort 1.4 Alt Mode) (charging), Headphone output

  • Data Link Protocols: Bluetooth 5.3, IEEE 802.11a, IEEE 802.11ac, IEEE 802.11ax (Wi-Fi 6E), IEEE 802.11b, IEEE 802.11g, IEEE 802.11n

  • Finger Print Reader: Fingerprint reader

  • Max Operating Temperature: 95 degree Fahrenheit
  • Min Operating Temperature: 50 degree Fahrenheit
  • Operating Humidity: 0 - 90% (non-condensing)

Features

  • Advanced image signal processor (ISP), Center stage camera, Desk view support, Dictation, FaceTime 1080p HD camera, Increase contrast, Live Captions, Reduce motion, Switch Control, Voice Control, VoiceOver screen reader

Input Device Features

  • Force click, Multi-Touch Gesture Recognition, Multi-touch touchpad, Pressure sensitivity, Touch ID sensor

  • Keys Layout: QWERTY
  • Localization: English

  • Battery Capacity: 53.8 watt hour(s)
  • Battery Chemistry: Lithium polymer
  • Frequency: 50/60 hertz
  • Power Provided: 35 watt
  • Required Voltage: AC 100-240 volt
  • Battery Run Time (Up To): 18 Hours

Included Items

Certifications & Listings

  • EPEAT Compliant: Yes

  • Color: Midnight

  • Weight: 2.73 lbs
  • Width: 12 inch
  • Depth: 8.5 inch

  • Limited Warranty: 1 Year

  • SKU: ZEA-00004
  • Color: Platinum

  • Short side: 208.6mm
  • Long side: 287mm
  • Thickness: 9.3mm

Tablet Specifications

  • Screen Diagonal: 13"
  • Resolution: 2880x1920
  • Refresh Rate: 120Hz
  • Aspect Ratio: 3:2
  • Pixel Density: 266ppi
  • Screen Type: LCD (edge-lit)
  • Display Protection: Gorilla Glass 5
  • HDR Support: Dolby Vision, Dolby Vision IQ
  • Brightness: 600cd/m²
  • Touchscreen Technology: Capacitive
  • Number of Rear Cameras: 1
  • Camera Resolution: 10.5MP
  • Front Camera Location: Long side
  • Number of Cores: 12
  • Maximum Turbo Clock Frequency: 4.9GHz
  • Integrated GPU: Intel Graphics 4-Cores iGPU (Arc)
  • Memory Type: LPDDR5X
  • Working Memory: 64GB
  • Storage Type: Solid State Disk
  • Storage Capacity: 1TB
  • Battery Capacity: 48Wh
  • Connection (WLAN): 802.11a, 802.11b, 802.11g, Wi-Fi 4 (802.11n), Wi-Fi 5 (802.11ac), Wi-Fi 6 (802.11ax), Wi-Fi 6E (802.11ax)
  • Wi-Fi Band: 2.4GHz, 5GHz (band 1), 6GHz (band 1)
  • Bluetooth: Bluetooth 5.3
  • Other Wireless Connections: Near Field Communication (NFC)
  • Connections: 2x Thunderbolt 4, 1x USB type-C (video out)
  • Tablet Housing Material: Aluminum
  • Sensors: Accelerometer, Gyroscope, Compass, Ambient light sensor
  • Biometric Security: Facial recognition
  • Tablet Features: Suitable for active stylus
  • Active Stylus Support: Microsoft Surface Slim Pen 2

Software Support Info

  • For Windows 10, there are different end dates for support for the different versions: https://docs.microsoft.com/en-us/lifecycle/products/windows-10-home-and-pro. For Windows 11, there is no end date known (yet).
  • Included Extras: Charger
